You should have just now received a set of posts to the Cantera  
User's Group.  To the authors of these messages - I'm sorry it took  
me so long to approve them; I've been preoccupied with some medical  
issues in my family for a few weeks, and frankly my attention to  
Cantera waned during this time.  I am happy to report that the  
medical issues have now been largely resolved (successfully) and  
there should no longer be such a long lag time in approving new  
messages.

Some background:   The user's group is configured so that I have to  
approve messages from new members.  This was done a few years ago, to  
stop people who were joining the group only to post ads about their  
product or service (prescription medication from Canada, dating  
services, etc.) and who had NO INTEREST in Cantera.  Once new members  
have made a post or two that shows that the messages have appropriate  
content for the User's Group, then their status is changed, so that  
they can submit messages directly, without requiring my approval of  
each message.

Of course, this all breaks down if the "approver" is for any reason  
unavailable...  I will look into the possibility of adding a few  
others to the set of "message approvers", to avoid situations like  
this in the future.
